['Level 10 left talent: +30 movement speed reduced to +25.', 'Level 20 left talent: +20 health regen increased to +25.', 'Reduced base health regeneration from 1.5 to 0.', 'Reduced base mana regeneration from 0.9 to 0.', ' Atrophy Aura

No longer pierces spell immunity.

['Increased  strength gain from 2.6 to 2.9.', 'Reduced base health regeneration from 0.25 to 0.', ' Atrophy Aura\nThe attack damage bonus on self is no longer dispelled on death.\nIncreased attack damage reduction from 4%/16%/28%/40% to 7%/18%/29%/40%.', 'The attack damage bonus on self is no longer dispelled on death.', 'Increased attack damage reduction from 4%/16%/28%/40% to 7%/18%/29%/40%.', "Added  Aghanim's Scepter for Underlord. Causes  Atrophy Aura's bonus damage to be granted to nearby allied heroes for half the values. Increases bonus damage duration from 30/40/50/60 to 70/80/90/100."]

['Increased root interval from 3.5 to 3.6.', 'Increased cooldown from 30/26/22/18 to 32/28/24/20.', ' Pit of Malice\nIncreased root interval from 3.5 to 3.6.\nIncreased cooldown from 30/26/22/18 to 32/28/24/20.']

['Level 10: +2 mana regen or +4 armor', 'Level 15: +10% spell damage amplification or +200 health', 'Level 20: +100 cast range or +50 attack speed', 'Level 25: +0.4s  Pit of Malice root duration or +50 health regen', "Enabled in Captain's Mode", ' Pit of Malice
No longer pierces spell immunity.
No longer interrupts channeling abilities upon rooting.
No longer deals 100 damage.
Now roots units every 3.5 seconds, instead of only once upon entering the pit.
Reduced root duration from 1/1.5/2/2.5 to 0.9/1.2/1.5/1.8.
Increased pit duration from 7 to 12.
Increased pit radius from 275 to 375.
Reduced cast time from 0.6 to 0.45.

Increased radius from 450 to 600.

['Reduced  Pit of Malice cooldown from 24/21/18/15 to 21/18/15/12.', ' Atrophy Aura\nIncreased attack damage bonus per hero death from 30 on each level to 30/35/40/45.\nRescaled attack damage bonus duration from 30/35/40/45 to 25/40/55/70.', 'Increased attack damage bonus per hero death from 30 on each level to 30/35/40/45.', 'Rescaled attack damage bonus duration from 30/35/40/45 to 25/40/55/70.', 'Further changes can be seen in the update history, due to them not belonging to any game version.']
['Increased attack range from 128 to 150.']
['Restored the old  Firestorm (undid the 6.72 changes).', 'Replaced Expulsion with  Atrophy Aura.']

['Increased explosion interval from 1.25 to 1.5.', 'Increased mana cost from 125 to 125/135/145/155.', 'Expulsion\nIncreased explosion interval from 1.25 to 1.5.\nIncreased mana cost from 125 to 125/135/145/155.']
['Reduced base armor from 3 to 2 (total armor is now 3.68).', 'Increased collision size from 12 to 24.']

['Added a visual effect to  Dark Rift to visualise its teleport radius.']
[' Dark Rift can now be cast by targeting the ground or the minimap. It automatically targets the closest valid target within 3500 range of the targeted point.']

['Replaced  Dark Portal with  Dark Rift']

['Increased  intelligence gain from 2.2 to 2.6.', ' Dark Portal
Can no longer target inside base areas.
Can no longer target areas the player has no vision over on level 1 and 2, can still target fogged areas on level 3.
Units can no longer go back and forth through the portal. Each unit may use the portal only once in one direction.
Increased portal duration from 15/20/25 to 60 on each level.
Increased channel time from 4/3/2 to 6/5/4.
Increased cooldown from 150/120/90 to 200 on each level.
